mapper.select: SELECT accom_res_id, accom_id, reservation_id, trip_day_id, guests, hotel_name, address, price, room_type, room_image_url, checkin_day, checkout_day, max_guests, created_at, updated_at, status FROM accom_res WHERE accom_id = (SELECT accom_id FROM accom_res WHERE accom_res_id = #{accomResId} LIMIT 1) AND status = 'AVAILABLE' AND max_guests >= #{guests} AND DATE(checkin_day) <= #{checkinDay} AND DATE(checkout_day) >= #{checkoutDay} ORDER BY price ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE accom_res SET reservation_id = #{reservationId}, trip_day_id = #{tripDayId}, guests = #{guests}, status = 'CONFIRMED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE accom_id = (SELECT accom_id FROM (SELECT accom_id FROM accom_res WHERE accom_res_id = #{accomResId}) AS temp) AND room_type = (SELECT room_type FROM (SELECT room_type FROM accom_res WHERE accom_res_id = #{accomResId}) AS temp2) AND price = (SELECT price FROM (SELECT price FROM accom_res WHERE accom_res_id = #{accomResId}) AS temp3) AND DATE(checkin_day) = DATE(#{checkInTime}) AND DATE(checkout_day) = DATE(#{checkOutTime}) AND reservation_id IS NULL AND status = 'AVAILABLE' AND max_guests >= #{guests} ORDER BY CASE WHEN accom_res_id = #{accomResId} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END LIMIT 1

SELECT ac.hotel_name FROM accommodation_info ac JOIN accom_res ar ON ac.accom_id = ar.accom_id WHERE ar.accom_res_id = #{accomResId}
